thread.title: Hamburgers might be on the menu for Russian astronauts - Valley Morning Star
thread.title_full: Hamburgers might be on the menu for Russian astronauts - Valley Morning Star - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Valley Morning Star
title: Hamburgers might be on the menu for Russian astronauts - Valley Morning Star
text:
The Russian research institute responsible for designing meals for the country's astronauts said Thursday they would not be opposed to adding the American fast-food staple to their menus.
Start the conversation, or Read more at Valley Morning Star.
